card.name: A Lender Be
card.text: You were so enamored of books that your goal was to be a librarian like your mentor TUKOR. He set you a task: You must discover 2 TOMES in different languages, and within them 2 SPELLS with different icons. You had to travel to 3 different GREAT LIBRARY OF THE DREAMLANDS cards, but in the end you succeeded. (When you play this card you may move your Spells among legal Tomes and Allies who can know a Spell)

card.name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
card.text: When THE CHILDREN HAVE SWEET DREAMS, you are finally able to rest. Falling asleep, you leave your Waking World HOUSE behind and find yourself wandering through the GATE OF DEEPER SLUMBER and into the CAVERN OF FLAME. Then the NIGHTMARE strikes! You wake to find yourself at a Waking World SITE! How did you get here? And what's that you're holding? (If you are in the Waking World when this card is played, you may also play one Dreamlands Artifact or Tome).

card.name: Accouterments of Heroes
card.text: This Artifact has constant effect: Ignore the bonus values of Weapons in Directed Threats opposing, and held by Allies Assaulting, your Investigator.

card.name: Algol
card.text: Bury all Star Events in play. While in play, the Spell capacity of Tomes increases by one. These extra Spells remain if this card is Buried.

card.name: Anathema
card.text: Choose a Spell in target Tome and flip it face down.

card.name: Angry Zoogs
card.text: Investigator with the highest Sanity (high Education if tied) must either Bury all Allies in play lacking the Dreamer attribute, or spend 3 points of Sanity to keep them all in play.

card.name: Armed and Clueless
card.text: You first came across it in the old RUINS. What is this ENCHANTED WEAPON, and how does it work? You knew the ancient DREAMER could figure it out, but how to find him? You travelled to a LOCATION in the EAST, and then a LOCATION in the WEST, and finally found him in an EXOTIC LOCATION.

card.name: Art of Magic, The
card.text: Learning the Art of Magic is not simple. You must visit a LIBRARY, a SITE, and a COUNTRY GATE LOCATION to gain knowledge. Meet with TWO ALLIES that are either Spiritualists, Occultists, Priests, or Dreamers. Only then will you be able to translate a TOME with the Dream Icon, and learn a SPELL.

card.name: Atal the High Priest
card.text: You may Bury Atal the High Priest instead of paying the Sanity cost for casting a Spell.

card.name: Awful Doom of Cerrit, The
card.text: Discard a random Ally.

card.name: Barrier of Seol Seril
card.text: This Spell may be cast during Combat only. No Monsters in any Threat Bypass Combat.

card.name: Barzai the Wise
card.text: Can know any two Dream icon Spells; can know any one Spell otherwise. Bury Spell after it is cast.

card.name: Basalt Pillars of the West
card.text: You may walk to Splendid Cathuria, the Far Side of the Moon, or any Space Location.

card.name: Basil Elton
card.text: You may use any Travel by Sea Event to travel within the same Region

card.name: Basilisk
card.text: When revealed, Flip all of opponent's Defending Allies whose current value is an odd number. Basilisks Bypass Combat with opponent's Threats

card.name: Batophobia
card.text: Lose 1 point of Sanity at the beginning of each Turn that your Current Location features the City attribute

card.name: Battle Axe
card.text: Add 3 points to Ally's value; Ally is now Steadfast.

card.name: Beast in the Cataract, The
card.text: Add 1 point to the cost of casting any Spell. This card is immune to the effects of any Star Event. Bury this card at the end of the Round.

card.name: Being of Ib
card.text: When revealed, add 1 point to the value of this card for each Ally opponent has committed to defend against the Being of Ib. Joins Beings of Ib.

card.name: Betrayal
card.text: A random Corrupt Ally immediately attacks the other Allies. Opponent chooses how to absorb this damage. Opponent's Investigator is not attacked and loses no Sanity. Bury target Corrupt Ally

card.name: Beyond Your Wildest Dreams
card.text: All your life you thought magic a child's myth, but now you know the magnificent truth! To begin you journey to a distant EXOTIC LOCATION - first TRAVEL BY LAND, and then TRAVEL BY AIR. Once there, with the proper STAR in the sky, you take out the ancient TOME and chant the SPELL found within. You perform the magical rites of initiation, and now may call yourself a PRIEST of the eternal powers.

card.name: Black Galley
card.text: Target player must choose either to Bury a Corrupt Ally or Discard a Steadfast Ally.

card.name: Blizzard
card.text: No Travel by Land Events may be played while this card is in play. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played. Does not affect Travel Events in play.

card.name: Bokrug
card.text: All Locations feature the Water attribute. Do not Bury Storm Events. No Investigators may gain Sanity unless they are in Mnar

card.name: Book of Beautiful Devices
card.text: You may find Dreamlands Artifacts in the Waking World

card.name: Book of the Black Stones, The
card.text: You may find Dreamlands Artifacts in the Waking World

card.name: Bored Housewife
card.text: While a Dreamlands Location is the top card of your Story Deck, your Education rises to 14.

card.name: Bridge over the River Skai, The
Buopoth
card.text: Monsters opposing the Buopoth do not Bypass. Joins with all Monsters

card.name: Captain of the White Ship, The
card.text: This card can be played in the Dreamlands or in the Waking World. You may play a Travel by Sea Event when normally prohibited by a Storm Event

card.name: Carter's Clock
card.text: Bury this card to move any Location in your Story Deck to the top of the deck. Ignore Sanity gain/loss; may reuse gate.

card.name: Carter's Quest
card.text: Using CARTER'S CLOCK, you met up with fellow explorer RANDOLPH CARTER at a SITE during a FANTASTIC DREAM. He told you about THE SNAKE-DEN, near the LAIR of a MONSTER. To reach it you traveled on a ZEBRA or YAK (choose one) and met a CORRUPT CULTIST who knew the way to the ISLAND LOCATION. You and your FRIEND went on to the CASTLE OF THE GREAT ONES ON KADATH, and then returned to tell your story to the KING.

card.name: Castle of the Great Ones on Kadath
card.text: There must be a Star Event in play to play this card. You must Travel by Air to reach the Castle of the Great Ones on Kadath and Travel by Air to leave it. While this is your Current Location, all Spells cost no Sanity for your Investigator to cast.

card.name: Cat Chieftain, The
card.text: If your current Location features the City attribute you may flip this card face-down and immediately play a new Location that features the City attribute from the same Region right-side up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Cat from Saturn
card.text: A Cat from Saturn cannot be Summoned or Controlled. If chosen as the target of Control Spell, the Spell has no effect. A Cat from Saturn Bypasses Combat with opponent's Threat. Joins Cats from Saturn.

card.name: Cats of Ulthar
card.text: You must have the Cat Chieftain in play to play this card. Immediately play a new Dreamlands Location, or Exotic Location in any Dimension, right-side-up on top of your Story Deck, regardless of Travel requirements.

card.name: Causeway and Father Neptune, The
card.text: During Combat, Bury any Monster Directed at your Investigator whose value increases at Locations featuring the Water attribute.

card.name: Cavern of Flame
card.text: All Dreamer Allies add 2 points to their value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Channel Prophecy
card.text: Take a 13-second glance at a number of cards on top of your Mythos Deck equal to your Investigators current Maximum.

card.name: Children Have Sweet Dreams, The
card.text: While this card is in play, add 1 point to the value of all your Allies. Bury this card at the end of the round.

card.name: Chorazin
card.text: All Phobias affect only the Investigator who played them. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: City of Gugs
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Gug and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts.

card.name: Come Sail Away
card.text: Living in a quiet KINGSPORT LOCATION, you thought your life would never change. But one day the old SEAMAN invited you to TRAVEL BY SEA to lands he said you had never even imagined. Saying good-bye to your old friend BASIL ELTON, you set sail across the starlit seas. After what seemed like months of drifting with the winds, you saw a LIGHTHOUSE in the distance, and finally made PORT at a DREAMLANDS LOCATION.

card.name: Command Lamp-Eft
card.text: It is now Day; put this card in Event area. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Night Events may not be played. Once cast, Bury this card if any Day Event is played.

card.name: Concentric Rings of the Worm
card.text: This Spell may be cast during Combat only. Bury one random Monster card chosen from any one Directed Threat attacking your Investigator.

card.name: Cornwall-by-the-Sea
card.text: All Gentleman Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your current Location.

card.name: Crag of Ghouls
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Ghoul and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts.

card.name: Crystal Sword
card.text: If the Ally bearing the Crystal Sword opposes an opponent's Defending or Assaulting Allies, Flip one random Corrupt Ally of opponent before resolving Combat.

card.name: Crystal World
card.text: Your Investigator is able to Breathe Underwater for the remainder of the round. If a Star Event is in play, your Investigator is also able to survive in Space.

card.name: Days of Wine and Roses
card.text: The roses were blooming by the HOUSE LOCATION in Kingsport when you first noticed the SUN SPOTS. As if in a dream you travelled to the HARBOR OF CELEPHAIS, where you played the LUTE OF OONAI and drank the WINE OF PNOTH. But alas, with EVENING comes sorrow, and you lost your beloved STEADFAST ALLY to the AWFUL DOOM OF CERRIT.

card.name: Deflection
card.text: This Spell may be cast during Combat only. Target Defending Ally becomes your Defending Ally for the remainder of Combat. Return Ally to opponent or Bury Ally in opponent's Story Deck, as appropriate, at the end of Combat

card.name: Dhole
card.text: When revealed, if opponent's Current Location features the Underground attribute, you my Bury this card and cause opponent to Bury his or her Current Location. Ignore revealed Sanity gain/loss. Joins Dholes.

card.name: Doomed if You Do
card.text: The power must be yours! You listened to the whispers of your LIVING DEAD ALLY and became obsessed with learning the secrets of the Gods. Searching all over MNAR (3 different locations), you finally discovered an elusive BEING OF IB who would teach you the rites to propitiate the Great Old One BOKRUG. In the favor of the god, you were taught the SPELL that can only be found in the TOME with a Dream Icon.

card.name: Dream Sending of Glaaki
card.text: Cancel a Spell just cast on you and choose a new appropriate target, as if you are casting the same Spell.

card.name: Elephant Caravan
card.text: On a following turn, play a new Location card in the same Region, right-side-up on top of your Story Deck. Remain with the Elephant Caravan for a Turn to play one Tome or Artifact card (only one card per Elephant Caravan).

card.name: Embody Charnal Odor of Xura
card.text: Summon or Control one Lesser Servitor Monster

attr.value: Affects Your Hand or Opponent's Directed Threat

card.name: Enchanted Stone, The
card.text: On a following turn you may play Tower of Koth right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Enchanted Wood, The
card.text: All Chief Allies add 2 points to their value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Enthusiastic Chorus Girl
card.text: Have opponent to your right cut his or her deck and look at the bottom card of the cut. Add Sanity gain or loss indicated in that card's pentagram (if any).

card.name: Equilateral Screen
card.text: Take a 13-second glance at all cards in one opponent's Threat.

attr.value: Steadfast Dreamer & Explorer, Knows English, Greek & French

card.name: Even Stranger Case of Charles Fort
card.text: When you began investigating strange phenomena for that fine GENTLEMAN, you didn't quite know what you were getting into . The RAIN OF FISH and SWARM OF INSECTS scared you a bit, but you didn't develop a PHOBIA until the STRANGE HUMANOID ENCOUNTER. You've decided to try and get away from it all in the COUNTRY. If that doesn't work, you'll head out to a PORT or STATION and leave town. The truth is out there...

card.name: Evening
card.text: It is now Day. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. All Invisible Monsters add 1 point to their value

card.name: Exploited Coal Miner
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard two cards and replace them with two new cards drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Falsely Imprisoned Convict
card.text: Have opponent to your right cut his or her deck and look at the bottom card of the cut. Add Sanity gain or loss indicated in that card's pentagram (if any).

card.name: Far Side of the Moon
card.text: Beginning each Turn you must be able to survive in Space or lose 5 points of Sanity. You may reuse this Gate. For each Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Star Event. You must Travel by Air to leave this Location.

card.name: Fireworm of Parg
card.text: All Monsters in a Directed Threat with a Fireworm of Parg function as if it is Day.

card.name: Four-Armed is Forewarned
card.text: Ah, the lure of the mysterious underworld - what will you meet in the dark land of the realm of dream? It is wise to go prepared, and so you bring your favourite WEAPON and an EXPLORER. By NIGHT you travel deep to TWO different UNDERWORLD LOCATIONS. But how could you have known of the terrible horror of the towering GUG?!? Your Weapon and Ally protect you; still you cannot erase that dark memory that etched a PHOBIA into your psyche.

card.name: Gate of Deeper Slumber
card.text: You may use this Gate more than once but you must Flip a Dreamer Ally face-down for each subsequent use.

card.name: Gate of Oneirology, The
card.text: If you are in the Waking World immediately play any Dreamlands Location as if walking. If you are in the Dreamlands immediately play any Waking World Location as if walking. You may not play Exotic Locations

card.name: Gathering, The
card.text: Before any great quest, there must first come a gathering of forces. To unite your companions, the CHIEF, the PRIEST, the MERCHANT, and the DREAMER, you must journey to THREE LOCATIONS in different cities, towns or villages. To equip yourself, you must find your destined WEAPON and the ACCOUTERMENTS OF HEROES. Finally, to purify yourself, you must visit a holy place (a CHURCH or a TEMPLE). You are ready... (When this card is played, you may take any one Chief, Priest, Merchant, or Dreamer from your Story Deck and return it to play.)

card.name: Ghasts
card.text: Subract 1 from the value of this card if it is Day. When revealed, add 2 points to the value of this card if opposing Gugs. Joins Ghasts

card.name: Ghost-Being of Ib
card.text: Flip the Ghost-Being of Ib face-down to cause an opponent to Flip an Artifact of your choice face-down.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist, Living Dead, Knows Glyphs

card.name: Ghoul
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if the Current Location of you or your opponent features the Underground attribute. Joins Ghouls

card.name: Gnor
card.text: Add 2 points to the value of this card if the Current Location of you or your opponent features the Underwater attribute. Joins Gnor.

card.name: Great Abyss
card.text: On a following turn you may play Sarkomand right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Great Bazaar, The
card.text: You may join two Artifacts each Turn at The Great Bazaar

card.name: Great Library of the Dreamlands
card.text: You may, on a later Turn, play any Great Library of the Dreamlands card right-side-up, or you may walk to Celaeno.

card.name: Great Library of the Dreamlands
card.text: You may, on a later Turn, play any Great Library of the Dreamlands card right-side-up, or you may walk to Celaeno.

card.name: Great Library of the Dreamlands
card.text: You may, on a later Turn, play any Great Library of the Dreamlands card right-side-up, or you may walk to Celaeno.

card.name: Great Library of the Dreamlands
card.text: You may, on a later Turn, play any Great Library of the Dreamlands card right-side-up, or you may walk to Celaeno.

card.name: Great Menagerie, The
card.text: It is your goal to gather together a fantastic menagerie of the most splendid creatures in the world. With the help of your friend (any ADVENTURER or EXPLORER), journey to THREE different OUTSIDE LOCATIONS, and discover FOUR MONSTERS of different subtypes. Once your creatures have been gathered, you will need to find a nice CITY LOCATION to house your menagerie in.

card.name: Green Mist of Doom
card.text: If it is Day, Bury opponent's Current Location. If it is Night, Discard opponent's Current Location.

card.name: Guardians of the Great Ones
card.text: All opponents must play Monster cards to their Threat face-up. Bury this card if any Day or Night Event is played. When this card is Buried, face-up Monster cards are flipped face-down.

card.name: Gug
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if opposing Ghouls or Ghasts. Add 1 point to the value of this card if the Current Location of you or your opponent features the Underground attribute. Joins Gugs

card.name: Haragrim
card.text: Protection from cards that cause you to lose Artifacts and Tomes. At the moment when you would lose an Artifact or Tome, you may Bury Haragrim instead. Your opponent must then Bury his or her card.

card.name: Harbor of Celephais, The
card.text: Spend 2 Sanity points to recover one Artifact from your Story Deck and bring it into play. Ignore Sanity gain/loss for playing Weapons.

card.name: Harbor of the Black Galley
card.text: Bury a Monster from your Threat to Bury opponent's random Ally

card.name: Hero's Journey, The
card.text: After THE GATHERING, your heroic journey can begin. You travel extensively, using TWO TRAVEL EVENTS, to track the evil that lies across the land. You even descend to the UNDERWORLD (any Location in the Underworld region). From this realm of death you return reborn, emerging at any non-Underworld LOCATION. Finally, finding the evil that plagues the land (any GREAT OLD ONE or OUTER GOD), you dispatch it! A new DAY dawns... (When this card is played, Bury all Great Old Ones and Outer Gods currently in play. Then gain the Sanity bonus for playing this card.)

card.name: Hesper Payne
card.text: Can know any one Spell. Bury Spell after it is cast.

attr.value: Corrupt Cultist & Spiritualist, Knows English & Greek

card.name: Hesper Payne's House
card.text: You may cast a Spell from your Hand. Pay Sanity cost for Casting Spell, and Discard Spell after it has been cast.

card.name: Highway Robbery
card.text: Cause an opponent to Bury a random Artifact, or if it is Night and opponent's Investigator is Outside or in a Country Location, cause opponent to Discard a random Artifact. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Homeless Waif
card.text: At the beginning of each turn, draw ("beg") one card from your Mythos Deck. You may not Pass (to try to end the Round). You must play or you must discard one card.

card.name: Hovel of the Cat Haters, The
Howard Lovecraft
card.text: Flip this card face-down to draw a new card from the top of your Mythos deck.

attr.value: Steadfast Author & Dreamer, Knows English & Hyperborean

card.name: Hunter, The
card.text: You may Bury The Hunter instead of paying the Sanity cost for playing one Mythos card to your threat.

card.name: Ibbix the Harbormaster
card.text: If your current Location is a Travel by Sea Event, you may play a Location that does not feature the Water attribute but otherwise meets the requirements of the Travel by Sea Event.

card.name: Idol of Bokrug
card.text: This Artifact has constant effect: Your Investigator is able to Breathe Underwater. Bury this card to keep Bokrug in play for an additional round.

card.name: If I Ran the Zoog
card.text: I'd galumpf on the back of my big hairy Yak, to TRAVEL so far by the light of a STAR. To the dark OPAL THRONE where the KING sits alone, corralling, at noonith, a burrowing VOONITH. And in the VALE OF PNOTH snag a big BUOPOTH. I would capture a GUG in the TEMPLE OF BOKRUG, and then to the glen where they're dancing to fugues those whirlingly, twirlingly, ANGRY ZOOGS.

card.name: Ilarnek
card.text: When this becomes your Current Location, Flip face-up all face-down Artifacts you have in play.

card.name: Iranon the Explorer
card.text: Spend a turn with Iranon in any Country Site Location and Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Ironmind
card.text: Increase your maximum by three for the remainder of the Round. Not cumulative with other cards that raise your maximum

card.name: King Kuranes
card.text: As long as he is chosen as a defending Ally, King Kuranes raises the value of all Defending Attributes: Steadfast Allies by 1 point per card. Not cumulative with another Ally's Command Ability

card.name: King of Ilek-Vad, The
card.text: To play this card you must also Bury Randolph Carter; you may not play Carter while you have the King of Ilek-Vad in play. Flip this card face-down to draw two new cards from the top of your Mythos deck.

card.name: Kranon
card.text: Burgomaster of Ulthar. During combat, if your current location is in Ulthar, subtract 1 from each Directed Threat attacking your Investigator

card.name: Labyrinths of the Gnorri, The
card.text: Beginning each Turn that this card is your Current Location, you must be able to Breathe Underwater or lose 5 points of Sanity. When Threats are revealed Bury any Greater Monster Directed at your Investigator.

card.name: Lassitude of Phein
card.text: Flip a target Ally

card.name: Leng Spider
card.text: When revealed, the Leng Spider eats (Buries) one random Lesser Monster in the Directed Threat which opposes it.

card.name: Lesser Shantak
card.text: When revealed, subtract 1 point from the value of this card if opposing Nightgaunts. Joins Lesser Shantaks and Corrupt Cultists.

card.name: Lin Carter
card.text: As a Turn you may Flip this card face-down and draw a new card from the top of your Mythos deck.

card.name: Lunar Eclipse
card.text: It is now night. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. All Living Dead Allies add 1 point to their value.

card.name: Lute of Oonai
card.text: This Artifact has constant effect: Your Musician Allies add 1 point to their value. Bury the Lute of Oonai to cancel a Spell just cast on you.

card.name: Lyric Poet
card.text: As your Turn one time during a Round, you may Discard one card and replace it with a new card drawn from your Mythos Deck.

card.name: Magic Spear
card.text: If the Ally on which this Weapon is played blocks 1 or 2 points of damage, Bury this Weapon but not the Ally.

card.name: Man of Leng
card.text: Joins with any Lesser Independent.

card.name: Market-Place, The
card.text: All Merchant Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your Current Location

card.name: Meow Ceremony, The
card.text: Catastrophe! Who's been killing the CATS OF ULTHAR? Who left that corpse at THE MARKET-PLACE, or the other at THE WHITE WHALE INN? Is it the hated CAT FROM SATURN, as some suggest? The CAT CHIEFTAN calls a meeting of all cats, and they converge upon the HOVEL OF THE CAT HATERS, putting an end to this horror with the PETITION OF MENES.

card.name: Merchant of Ill Repute
card.text: Bury the Merchant of Ill Repute to cause an opponent to Bury a random Artifact.

card.name: Merchant's Quarter
card.text: All Merchant Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Minion of Karakal
card.text: Randomly choose one of your opponent's Artifacts to Bury for each Minion of Karakal that survives the Cosmic Battle.

card.name: Monolith of Ib
card.text: This Artifact has constant effect: All Tomes featuring the Folk icon may hold one additional Folk Spell. If this card is lost, Bury all extra Folk Spells (your choice).

card.name: Moon Quest
card.text: One NIGHT, as the Moon's silvery light slides across your sleeping face, you are met by the KING OF ILEK-VAD, who asks you to accompany him on his journey to capture an exotic creature on the Moon. To get there, you must meet with a disreputable MERCHANT in an unsavoury LOCATION (any Location that costs Sanity). He takes the two of you in the hold of his noisome BLACK GALLEY to the FAR SIDE OF THE MOON, where you encounter a MOON-BEAST and return with to his kingdom.

card.name: Moon-Beast
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of this card if it is Night. Add 2 points to the value of this card if the Current Location of you or your opponent features the Space attribute, or if the Lunar Eclipse or Full Moon is in play.

card.name: Mt. Ngranek
card.text: You may walk to any Underworld Location from Mt. Ngranek. This card is not affected by Events or Spells played by your opponents that directly affect the top card of your Story Deck

card.name: Mysteries of Thalarion
card.text: Summon or Control one Greater Independent Monster

attr.value: Affects Your Hand or Opponent's Directed Threat

card.name: Nameless Lake, The
card.text: When this becomes your Current Location, each opponent reveals the top card of his or her Mythos Deck; you add or subract the Sanity cost for every card revealed. Discard revealed cards.

card.name: Nasht & Kaman-Thah
card.text: While your current Location is The Cavern of Flame, Bury Nasht & Kaman-Thah to play immediately any Waking World Location (except Exotic) right-side-up.

card.name: Necronomicon Dreamlands Edition, The
card.text: This card may be found at an Exotic Location only. You may walk between the Waking World and the Dreamlands as if they were in the same Region.

card.name: Nightgaunts
card.text: If Summoned, use Nightgaunts as a Travel by Air Event; immediately play a new Location right-side-up in any region. Joins Nightgaunts.

card.name: Nightmare
card.text: Use a Gate to play this card face-down to your Threat. Monsters in a Directed Threat with this card and the Monsters opposing them receive the benefit of their Special Effects, whether or not they are lost during the Cosmic Battle, as if they survived to affect the Investigator.

card.name: Nodens
card.text: No Monsters are Invisible. No Monsters Bypass Combat. No Investigator may gain Sanity.

card.name: North Point Lighthouse
card.text: You may play this card immediately after playing a Travel by Sea Event.

card.name: Old Brick Powderhouse
card.text: Spend 1 point of Sanity to bring into play a Weapon buried in your Story Deck. Ignore Sanity gain/loss from playing the Weapon.

card.name: Old Woman of the Enchanted Wood, The
card.text: Bury The Old Woman of the Enchanted Wood to cause an opponent to Discard one random Attributes: Steadfast Ally.

card.name: Onyx Temple, The
card.text: Make an appropriate sacrifice! Discard 1 random card from your hand. Remain here for one additional Turn and Discard 1 random card from your hand for each Phobia affecting your Investigator you wish to Bury.

card.name: Overworked Telephone Operator
card.text: While a Dreamlands Location is the top card of your Story Deck, you also know French

card.name: Palace of Seventy Delights, The
card.text: For each Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Peaks of Thok
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Nightgaunt and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts.

card.name: Perchance
card.text: It was a quiet DAY as you sat dreamily enjoying the WINE OF PNOTH that your friend had brought back from her trip to the old country. Then in what seemed an instant, the sky turned black; a TWISTER ripped your HOUSE into the sky and dropped you down outside a glittering PALACE. Luckily your house crushed a MONSTER. What an EVENT! Was it all a dream?

card.name: Petition of Menes
card.text: Randomly Bury one of your opponent's Allies lacking the Dreamer attribute.

card.name: Phobophobia
card.text: Any one Phobia currently affecting your Investigator is redirected against the opponent of your choice. Then Bury this card.

card.name: Plateau of Leng
card.text: You may use this Gate more than once. You must spend 1 point of Sanity for each subsequent use unless there is a Star Event in play.

card.name: Pnakotic Manuscripts
card.text: Bury this card to cancel the effects of an Event just played. Then Bury the Event.

card.name: Polaris
card.text: Bury any Star Event in play. All Monsters are Invisible.

card.name: Processional Boulevard
card.text: All Priest Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Rain of Fish
card.text: Play this card when a Storm is in play. All locations featuring the Water attribute gain the Gate attribute. Bury this card when any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Randolph Carter
card.text: This card can be played in the Dreamlands or in the Waking World. If your Current Location is in the Dreamlands, Randoph Carter can join with any one Attributes: Steadfast Ally.

card.name: Ravening Madness, The
card.text: Cause opponent's Investigator to lose 1 point of Sanity

card.name: Richard Upton Pickman
card.text: This card can be played in the Dreamlands or in the Waking World. You may use a Gate at Cemetery Locations to play Ghouls as Allies.

card.name: Rope & Anchor Tavern, The
card.text: For each Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Rude Awakening
card.text: Target opponent may play a Waking World Location next turn. If not, opponent suffers an attack worth 3 points (Allies may defend). Then Bury this card.

card.name: Ruins of Ib, The
card.text: Add 1 point to the value of each Being of Ib or Ghost-Being of Ib while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Sarkomand
card.text: On a following Turn you may play The Great Abyss right-side-up on top of your Story Deck. Add 1 point to the value of each Man of Leng while this is your Current Location

card.name: Serranian
card.text: You must Travel by Air to play this Location and Travel by Air to leave it. You may remain here for an additional Turn and bury all Phobias affecting your Investigator

card.name: Shantaks
card.text: When revealed, Bury this card if opposing Nightgaunts. If summoned, use Shantaks as a Travel by Air Event and immediately play a new Location in any Region including Space.

card.name: Ship of Clouds
card.text: Immediately play a new Location card in a different Region, right-side up on top of your Story Deck. May not play a Location within the same Region.

card.name: Shipwreck
card.text: Each opponent with a Travel by Sea Event as his or her Current Location immediately plays a random Location card from his or her hand (no effect if he or she has no Location cards).

card.name: Silver Key, The
card.text: Use a Gate to walk to any Location (except Exotic) in another Dimension. Flip this card when used.

card.name: Sky Galleon
card.text: On a following Turn play a new Location card in either the same or a different Region (including Space), right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Snake-Den, The
card.text: You may use this gate to play Dreamlands Monsters to your Threat

card.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice, The
card.text: You should never have messed with the Master's TOME! How could you know that the SPELL would sweep you away to THE ENCHANTED WOOD? You may never have escaped those dancing mushrooms if the pink ELEPHANT CARAVAN hadn't shown up. Just when you thought you were safe, tittering NIGHTGAUNTS carried you off to the PEAKS OF THOK. There a giant demon reveled amongst the flames threatening a nearby TOWN. If it were not for the monks of the TEMPLE OF LOVELINESS you would never again have seen the light of DAY.

card.name: Splendid Cathuria
card.text: You must have the Basalt Pillars of the West to play this card. Spend a Turn in Splendid Cathuria to gain 1 Sanity point. You must play a Waking World Location right-side-up on top of your Story Deck as your next Location.

card.name: Stars are Right, The
card.text: Bury any Star Event in play. You may use opponent's Event cards currently in play to meet conditions required to summon a Great Old One or Outer God

attr.value: Affects Playing Great Old Ones and Outer Gods

card.name: Strange High House in the Mist, The
card.text: You may use this gate to play Dreamlands Monsters to your Threat

card.name: Strange Humanoid Encounter
card.text: Playable only at Night. All Locations featuring the Forest attribute gain the Gate attribute. Bury this card when any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Street of Pillars, The
card.text: All Priest Allies add 1 point to their value while this is your Current Location.

card.name: Street of Tears
card.text: During Combat, add 1 point to each of your Directed Threats

card.name: Sun Spots
card.text: It is now Day. Bury any Day or Night Event in play. Bury all Star Events in play.

card.name: Swarm of Insects
card.text: Bury any Day or Night Event in play. All Outside Investigators lose 1 point of Sanity when this card is played. Bury this card if a Day, Night, or Storm Event is played

card.name: Tachyphobia
card.text: Lose 1 Sanity point each time you play a Travel Event.

card.name: Tall Lighthouse, The
card.text: You may play this card immediately after playing a Travel by Sea Event

card.name: Taran-Ish
card.text: Can know any one Spell. When Spell is cast you may choose to Flip the Spell face-down and pay its Sanity cost instead of Burying it.

attr.value: Steadfast Priest & Living Dead, Knows English & Glyph

card.name: Tcho-Tcho People
card.text: Joins with any Lesser Servitor.

card.name: Temple of Bokrug, The
card.text: Gain 5 Sanity. You must either Bury a Steadfast Ally or remain at this Location for an additional Turn to perform appropriate rites. For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Temple of Loveliness at Kiran, The
card.text: Gain 4 Sanity points, but reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. Apply any Sanity gain or loss indicated in the pentagram on the card, then Discard it. During each additional Turn that you remain here you may bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Temple of the Elder Ones
card.text: Reveal the top card of your Mythos Deck. If card revealed is a Monster, it attacks you immediately (Allies may defend), then Discard it. Discard any other card drawn. For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Temple of the Great Ones
card.text: Set aside this card and shuffle your Story Deck. Randomly Discard one Story Deck card, then replace this card. For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator.

card.name: Thag Weed
card.text: This Artifact has constant effect: Your investigator is able to survive in Space. Burn (Bury) Thag Weed to give all your Allies the Dreamer attribute for the remainder of the round.

card.name: Thaumaturgical Prodigies in the New England Canaan
Thaumaturgical Prodigies in the New-English Canaan
Throth's Stalwart
card.text: During Combat this round, target is Buried only if it takes its full card value in Sanity loss.

card.name: Tower of Koth
card.text: On a following Turn you may play The Enchanted Stone right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Tukor
card.text: Master Librarian of the Great Library of the Dreamlands. As your Turn you may Bury this card and play a Tome in any Location.

attr.value: Steadfast Scholar, Knows Glyph, Hyperborean & Atlantean

card.name: Turquoise Temple of Nath-Horthath, The
card.text: Gain 5 Sanity. You must either Bury a Corrupt Ally or remain here for an additional Turn in abject contemplation. For each additional Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Twister
card.text: Replace all Travel by Air cards with the Location card closest to the bottom of the Story Deck, right-side-up. Ignore revealed Sanity gain/loss. No Travel by Air Events may be played. Bury Twister if any Day or Night Event is played.

card.name: Unacknowledged Author
card.text: While a Dreamlands Location is the top card of your Story Deck, lower both Minimum and Maximum by 2.

card.name: Utopian Socialist
card.text: When Sanity is tied, this investigator always declines to go first.

card.name: Vale of Pnoth
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Dhole and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts.

card.name: Vaults of Zin
card.text: You may use this Gate to Summon one Ghast and immediately attack with it. Opponent may defend with Allies but not use Spells or Artifacts.

card.name: Voonith
card.text: When Voonith is revealed you may declare that it is in hibernation: set it aside. It does not participate in Combat this round. Begin the next round with the hibernating Voonith in your Threat. Joins Voonith.

card.name: Vortex of Far Journeying
card.text: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her Mythos Deck. If it is a Location it immediately becomes his or her Current Location. If it is a Monster it attacks him or her (Allies may defend), then is Discarded. If it is some other kind of card, it is Discarded.

card.name: Wandering Peddler
card.text: You may Bury the Wandering Peddler instead of paying the Sanity cost for playing one Artifact.

card.name: War Horse
card.text: The Ally on which this card is played may also use one additional Weapon with the War Horse.

card.name: Whirligig
card.text: Flip all face-down cards you currently have in play face-up, except Spells

card.name: White Ship, The
card.text: On a following Turn, play a new Location featuring the Water attribute in a different Region. If you have a Dreamer Ally that Location may be in any Dimension. If you have the Captain of the White Ship in play that Location may be any Exotic Location regardless of travel restrictions or the Water requirement.

card.name: White Whale Inn, The
card.text: For each Turn that you remain here you may Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Widowed Seamstress
card.text: While a Dreamlands Location is the top card of your Story Deck, lower both Minimum and Maximum by 1.

card.name: Wine of Pnoth
card.text: Give this card to an Ally in play. This card adds the Dreamer attribute to that Ally.

card.name: Yak
card.text: On a later Turn play a new Location in the same Region. You may as your turn remain on the Yak and Bury one Phobia affecting your Investigator

card.name: Zebra
card.text: Immediately play a new Location card in the same Region right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.

card.name: Zenig of Aphorat
card.text: Play only at an Exotic Location. May serve as any one card required to complete an Adventure. Bury when the Adventure card is played.

card.name: Zoog Chieftain, The
card.text: If your Current Location features the Country attribute you may Flip this card and immediately play a new Location that features the Country attribute from the same sub-region right-side-up on top of your Story Deck.
